black.description: Black or near-black, typically used for body text against a white background.

grey-dark.description: A dark grey used for less text contrast in places, and some light-on-dark sections

grey.description: A medium grey has lots of utility throughout; borders, text, everything

grey-light.description: Especially used for alternating sections with white background, but also versatile

main.description: A medium shade of an on-brand blue, ideally. Used for links by default

main-dark.description: A dark shade of the main hue, used for thematic backgrounds

main-light.description: A very light shade of the main hue, used for backgrounds primarily.

second.description: Medium shade of what is usually a hot color like red, yellow, or orange

second-dark.description: A darker shade of the secondary hue

second-light.description: A light shade of the secondary hue

third.description: The third brand/theme color in a medium shade

third-dark.description: A dark shade of the third hue

third-light.description: A light shade of the third hue

accent.description: A special color, often a medium shade. If the brand has a purple or teal, it is great here
